mapper.insert: insert into tb_collector( goodstable_id, busertable_id,focustime) values ( #{gid}, #{uid},null)
mapper.select: select * from tb_collector where goodstable_id=#{gid} and busertable_id=#{uid}
select * from tb_cart where goodstable_id=#{gid} and busertable_id=#{uid}
mapper.update: update tb_cart set shoppingnum=shoppingnum+#{shoppingnum} where busertable_id=#{uid} and goodstable_id=#{gid}
mapper.select: select gt.id, gt.gname, gt.gpicture, gt.grprice, ct.shoppingnum, ct.shoppingnum*gt.grprice smallsum from TB_GOODS gt, TB_CART ct where gt.id=ct.goodstable_id and ct.busertable_id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from tb_cart where busertable_id=#{uid} and goodstable_id=#{gid}
